items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased as a Christmas dress for my wife - she loved it
items.body: Very nice dress. True to size and looks like the pictures. The fabric is good quality and is not see-thru at all. Material looks thick when worn, probably because of the ruching. The dress fits well and is flattering. Snugs every curve but is not restrictive like some other dresses. Doesn't ride up either A nice choice for a formal occasion but might be too warm for summer wear despite being breathable. Care instructions advise to hand wash which is not as convenient as something that can be machine washed. No negatives about this dress. It's a great value. Read more
items.author: BP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit for a Classy Night Out!
items.body: I recently purchased the LAGSHIAN Women's Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve Mock Neck Mesh Ruched Midi Party Dress, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! As someone who's 5'2" and 139 pounds, I was a bit skeptical about ordering a dress online, but this one fit like a dream. The sizing was true to size, and it accentuated my curves beautifully. The quality of this dress is top-notch. It feels well-made and comfortable to wear, which is crucial for a long evening out. The mesh and ruched design give it a classy and sophisticated look, making it perfect for any special occasion or cocktail event. I received numerous compliments on the dress, and I felt confident and elegant throughout the night. If you're looking for a stylish and well-fitting dress that's true to size, I highly recommend the LAGSHIAN Bodycon Midi Party Dress. It's a fantastic addition to any wardrobe, and I'm extremely pleased with my purchase! Read more
items.author: kyteecher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits and looks exactly as expected- comfy and flattering!
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this dress! Color is exactly as pictured, vibrant and beautiful. Fits great- I am 5'3", about 180lb, G cup bra and 3 months pregnant (with a larger than average belly). Plenty of stretch and still flattering! I'm definitely getting this in more colors. Read more
items.author: Samantha Vance

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchase in any color other than green
items.body: This dress was a much brighter green than i needed and I think that the color made it look cheap. I'm giving it four starts because there is a customer review where the dress looks the green I expected it to be so maybe I just got a bad color batch. It fits nice. The material is not see through. The Fabric is polyester and something so it is just awful. I can't see even wearing it to a holiday party. It's just such a bad green for the cheap material. I have a number of dresses from this company and love them not sure what happened with this green dress. Read more
items.author: tls78754

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curve-Hugging, Show-Stopper! BUY IT!
items.body: This dress is everything I hoped for and more! It hugs my curves in all the right places, creating a sleek and stunning silhouette that turned heads. The material is soft, stretchy, and comfortable while still feeling high-quality. The fabric is thick enough to give a good snatch to problem areas while also being warm. The zipper was perfectly functional and feels sturdy. The red is a rich, vibrant color, and you are going to stand out at any event. It’s a true confidence booster—I felt like a total show-stopper wearing it! The ruched details add a flattering touch, and the long sleeves and mock neck make it classy and chic. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a dress that combines style, sophistication, and a dash of daring! I have bought two other colors at this great value. Read more
items.author: Sed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: Very elegant and fits perfect. Ty Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get The Dress!!
items.body: This dress was perfect! It's true to size, I ordered a large, I'm 5'3, 5'4 ish & about 185. This dress snatches you up in all the right places, it's like you have a built in entire body trainer:) Jazz it up with a statement neck piece & bracelet & good to go. Great quality, it wasn't see through or thin. I give it a 10/10 honestly. I'd purchase again in different colors if need be. Definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Nikki Laniece

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for curves!
items.body: This dress looks amazing on curvy bodies, and the material is great! Read more
items.author: Leah

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Ruched Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Ruched Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Royalblue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
